argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matvsca2.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |

| 19 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> Y e. B ) |

| 25 | 9, 14, 3, 17, 18, 23, 24, 5 | #P_frlmvscafval | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X ( .s ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF .X. Y ) ) |
